message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll be very interested in. I'm willing to offer it to you for $14,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure if I'll be able to make it this low again.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That product sounds interesting, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $11,000?

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $13,000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate you working with me on the price, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle at $12,000?
